pr_title: Fix NPE, maxDepth default to zero instead of null when args is empty

timeline.message: Fix NPE, maxDepth default to zero instead of null when args is empty

timeline.bodyText:
args[0] could be null. How about something like
int maxDepth = (int) MoreObjects.firstNonNull(args.length > 0 ? args[0] : null, 0);
